class.name: pos_vel_acc_controllers/JointTrajectoryController
class.description: The JointTrajectoryController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a position/velocity/acceleration interface.

class.name: pos_vel_acc_err_humanoid_controllers/JointTrajectoryController
class.description: The JointTrajectoryController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a position/velocity/acceleration interface. Errors are also transmitted.

class.name: vigir_ros_controllers/PelvisTrajectoryController
class.description: The PelvisTrajectoryController executes "joint-space" trajectories on the x,y,z, roll, pitch, yaw of target pelvis pose. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a position command interface. Errors are also transmitted.
